newsitem.title: LEBANON: Israel said to have arrested Lebanese civilians.
newsitem.headline: Israel said to have arrested Lebanese civilians.

text.p: Israeli forces arrested on Sunday six Lebanese civilians in a south Lebanon village just outside Israel's south Lebanon occupation zone, residents said.

They said Israeli motorised patrol advanced one km (0.5 mile) outside the zone into the village of Arnoun, established a temporary checkpoint and arrested six Lebanese men before pulling back into the occupied area.
The operation lasted less than two hours, residents who arrived in the nearby village of Kfar Tibnit in south Lebanon's central sector told reporters.
Israel occupies a 15-km (nine miles)-wide occupation zone in south Lebanon and Moslem guerrillas attack Israeli and allied forces in a bid to oust them from the zone.
